items.sentence: I ordered a steak for me and a hamburger for Tom.
Tom almost always falls asleep while watching TV.
Tom hasn\'t yet decided whether he\'ll go or not.
Tom had no idea that Mary couldn\'t speak French.
Why would I ever want to buy something like that?
I got expelled from school during my senior year.
Tom apparently doesn\'t understand French at all.
I think Tom would\'ve come if you\'d invited him.
I think Tom would\'ve enjoyed tonight\'s concert.
I think it\'s great that you\'re able to do that.
